short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with test code coverage management, metadata analysis and deployment issue identification.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce Explorer: Your Essential Tool for Metadata Management & Test Coverage

Salesforce Explorer is designed to supercharge Salesforce developers' efficiency. By simplifying the management of metadata, test classes, and code coverage, this tool ensures smoother deployments and fewer errors.

Key Features:
Metadata Explorer: Easily track and package modified metadata, crucial for accurate and reliable deployments.

Effortless Test Class Discovery: Quickly find test classes linked to your Apex classes, streamlining your testing process.

Code Coverage Insights: Instantly view coverage for each test class, helping you focus on areas needing more testing to ensure solid code.

User-Friendly Interface: Navigate seamlessly through your metadata and test coverage metrics with a clean, intuitive design.

Enhanced Productivity: Simplify both metadata management and testing, allowing developers to focus on creating high-quality solutions.
